categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male Jedi Knight was a central character in an opera written by the Bith species. The opera told the story of how the Jedi Knight returned from traveling the stars in order to save his people.
The Jedi Knight was first mentioned in the short story "The End of History", which was written by Alexander Freed and published in Star Wars Insider 154 in 2014.
